CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​TopicEntry
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​Entry
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​TopicEntry

A single topic entry in the search index.

Functions

Topic topic,

Adds keywords to the list from the passed segment of text.  Returns how many were added

Properties
Topic
public Topic Topic { get }

The Topics.Topic associated with this entry.

DisplayName
public string DisplayName { get }

The full name of the entry as it should be displayed on screen, such as "Package::Package::Name".

EndOfDisplayNameQualifiers
public int EndOfDisplayNameQualifiers { get }

The index into DisplayName where the qualifiers end and the main symbol begins.  In "Package::Package::Name" the value will be 18, the index of "N".  If the name doesn't have qualifiers this will be zero.

SearchText
public string SearchText { get }
EndOfSearchTextQualifiers
public int EndOfSearchTextQualifiers { get }

The index into SearchText where the qualifiers end and the main symbol begins.  In "package.package.name" the value will be 16, the index of "n".  If the search text doesn't have qualifiers this will be zero.

Keywords
public List<string> Keywords { get }

A list of the keywords this entry should appear under.  They are case sensitive regardless of whether the language is or not.  Note that keywords are not generated for qualifiers, only the main part of the symbol.  For "Package.Package.Name" the only keyword will be "Name".
